abstract: American and Russian defense officials, during videoconference meeting, address Russian airstrike that hit garrison operated by American-backed Syrian rebels fighting Islamic State; Pentagon officials share growing concern that Russian attack has violated partial cease-fire agreement brokered in February.
lead_paragraph: In a videoconference with Russian counterparts, American defense officials discussed an attack on U.S.-backed forces who are fighting the Islamic State and who should be covered by a cease-fire.

headline.main: U.S. Tells Russia of ‘Strong Concerns’ About Strikes on Syrian Rebels
headline.print_headline: U.S. Tells Russia of Concerns  Over Strikes on Syrian Rebels

snippet: In a videoconference with Russian counterparts, American defense officials discussed an attack on U.S.-backed forces who are fighting the Islamic State and who should be covered by a cease-fire.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
